table.caption: Psychic Wind Psychic Effects
rows: You have the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition for 1 minute; you repeat the saving throw at the end of each of your turns, ending the effect on yourself on a success.
You have the {@condition Unconscious|XPHB} condition for 5 ({@dice 1d10}) hours; the effect on you ends if you take damage or if another creature takes an action to shake you awake.
table.name: Psychic Wind Psychic Effects
